items.name: Taste of Hate
explicitMods: 10% of Physical Damage from Hits taken as Cold Damage during Effect
Gain 13% of Physical Damage as Extra Cold Damage during effect
30% chance to Avoid being Chilled during Effect
30% chance to Avoid being Frozen during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: A sip will freeze your lips,
A swig will chill your heart,
A glass will still your soul.

items.name: The Supreme Truth
explicitMods: +1 to Level of Socketed Gems
60% increased Intelligence Requirement
99% increased Physical Damage
16% increased Attack Speed
3% increased Experience gain
20% increased Elemental Damage
flavourText: Knowledge brings power, and with power you can
grab truth by the throat and shape it as you wish.

items.name: Apocalypse Finger
explicitMods: +54 to Dexterity
16% increased Cast Speed
+78 to maximum Life
+65 to maximum Mana
+31% to Lightning Resistance

items.name: Dialla's Malefaction
explicitMods: Gems can be Socketed in this Item ignoring Socket Colour
Gems Socketed in Red Sockets have +2 to Level
Gems Socketed in Green Sockets have +30% to Quality
Gems Socketed in Blue Sockets gain 100% increased Experience
Has no Attribute Requirements
flavourText: He took me by my hand, promised me power beyond compare.
But I did not do it for power.
And I'd do it again in an instant.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill that hits enemies.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 137% increased Critical Strike Chance
Supported Skills have +2% to Critical Strike Chance
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Brimstone Goad
enchantMods: Regenerate 1.5% of Life per second if you were Hit Recently
explicitMods: 8% increased Armour
19% increased Life Regeneration rate
+41% to Fire Resistance
30% increased Movement Speed
6% increased Stun and Block Recovery

socketedItems.secDescrText: An icy blast explodes around the caster, dealing cold damage to enemies, and leaving behind a whirling vortex which deals cold damage over time and chills enemies caught in it. If the caster targets near their Frostbolt projectiles, it will explode from a number of those projectiles instead, destroying them.
explicitMods: Deals 1209 to 1813 Cold Damage
Base duration is 3.00 seconds
Deals 2317.2 Base Cold Damage per second
Modifiers to Spell Damage apply to this Skill's Damage Over Time effect
20% less Area of Effect when Cast on Frostbolt
76% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate
Can explode from up to 5 Frostbolt Projectiles
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses a single enemy, making them more vulnerable to Critical Strikes. Killing the cursed enemy will grant life and mana, and a power charge. You can only have one Mark at a time.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies have a 100% chance to grant a Power Charge when slain
Hits against Cursed Enemies have +1.5% to Critical Strike Chance
Hits against Cursed Enemies have +49% to Critical Strike Multiplier
Cursed enemies grant 600 Life when Killed
Cursed enemies grant 80 Mana when Killed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Creates a magical brand which can attach to a nearby enemy. It periodically activates while attached, triggering linked spells. The brand will detach if the enemy dies.
explicitMods: Activates every 1 second while Attached
Increases and Reductions to Cast Speed also apply to this Skill's Activation frequency
Can be Attached for a total Duration of 3.00 seconds
Can be Detached for a total Duration of 5.00 seconds
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

hybrid.secDescrText: Supports spell skills that have no reservation. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps or mines. Cannot modify the skills of minions.
